alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:29AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sullivan County through 500 AM EDT... At 429 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hartwood, or near Monticello, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fallsburg, Monticello, Neversink, South Fallsburg, Wurtsboro, Woodridge, Bloomingburg, Haven, Phillipsport and Loch Sheldrake. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 102 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
